name: Marley (Pokemon) LoRA
description:
Marley from Pokemon Diamond/Pearl. Trained on NAI.

Tested at 0.7-0.9 strength.

Trigger word is "marley".

Add "hair bow, gothic dress, detached sleeves, black leggings, black boots" for her typical look.

modelVersions.name: v1
trainedWords: hair bow, gothic dress, detached sleeves, black leggings, black boots
modelVersions.description: Fun fact: I had to train this four times because a single image of her with the bow on the wrong side kept ruining her hair.
